meanings.definition: A type of sugar found in honey and fruits.
meanings.sent1: Bees use laevuloses to make sweet honey.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating fruits that contain laevuloses.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole all the laevuloses from the beehive!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as laevuloses from ripe fruits.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of laevuloses in the air made my mouth water.

meanings.sent1: The recipe calls for two cups of laevuloses.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bag of laevuloses from the store.
meanings.sent3: The laevuloses in the bowl seemed to multiply on their own!
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of laevuloses, each with a unique story.
meanings.sent5: The jar was overflowing with colorful laevuloses, a sight to behold.
